text: Rugby is a town in Warwickshire,https://www.geograph.org.uk/search.php?form=simple&q;=Rugb&go;=Find England. Rugby is 15 miles northeast of Warwick and 30 miles southeast of Birmingham. It is most famous because Rugby football is named after the town, and it has a very old and famous school in the centre. The town's train station is on a mainline and connects to many places. Also, the town is near three motorways. == References == == Other websites == * GENUKI Category:Towns in Warwickshire
title: Rugby, Warwickshire
